name: First Monday of the New Year

object.name: First Monday of the New Year
object.content: An hour ago, I was ready to get to work on the first Monday of the new year... and then my wife reminded me that today is actually a holiday, since New Years fell on a Sunday this year. I'm still going to work on stuff, but the mood has changed.

source.content: An hour ago, I was ready to get to work on the first Monday of the new year... and then my wife reminded me that today is actually a holiday, since New Years fell on a Sunday this year. I'm still going towork on stuff, but the mood has changed.
